entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is a gamekeeper at Hogwarts and is known for his love of 'interesting creatures'. He is described as being emotional and upset about Buckbeak's situation.

entities.name: buckbeak
entities.description: Buckbeak is an Egyptian eagle that Hagrid has been caring for. He is described as being 'positively cute' by Hagrid's standards.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a student at Hogwarts and is known for her intelligence and quick thinking. She offers to help Hagrid defend Buckbeak in court.

entities.name: lucius malfoy
entities.description: Lucius Malfoy is a wealthy pure-blood wizard who has connections with the Disposal devils. He is described as being feared by them.

relationships.description: Hagrid cares for Buckbeak and is emotionally invested in his well-being.
Hermione offers to help Hagrid defend Buckbeak in court.
Lucius Malfoy has influence over the Disposal devils, who are afraid of him.
